mapper.select: SELECT good.goods_id , good.goods_code , good.goods_name , good.inventory_quantity , good.last_purchasing_price , good.min_num , good.goods_model , good.goods_producer , good.purchasing_price , good.remarks , good.selling_price , good.state , good.goods_unit , good.goods_type_id , type.goods_type_name , sale.total FROM t_goods good LEFT JOIN t_sale_list_goods sale ON good.goods_id = sale.goods_id LEFT JOIN t_goods_type type ON good.goods_type_id = type.goods_type_id
